summary: Adds a new spell that quickly and easily smelts all ore in your inventory.
descriptionHtml:
---Smelt All Ore Spell---

This mod adds a new spell that can be purchased at Belethor\'s General Goods that smelts all ore in your inventory. It is based off of the transmute spell so it gives experience to Alteration. Experience was rewritten to give Alteration XP per type of ore you smelt. Currently supports all ores.

---Compatibility---
This mod should be compatible with all mods as it only adds a new spell, but will not be compatible with any mods that change ingot recipes.

---Release History---
1.0 - Initial Release

---Notes---
If you have any questions or suggestion, please leave a comment and I\'ll get back to you as soon as possible.

This esp was cleaned using TES5Edit, therefore it does NOT need cleaning.
author: qwertyasdwek
